cd "/Users/hadi.rickit/dev/gallifrey landing" && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
Enhance AI security expertise positioning and messaging

- Transform hero messaging to focus on AI-powered threats and protection
- Update services to emphasize AI-resistant architecture, deepfake detection, and quantum-secure development
- Enhance trust/security section with AI governance and threat monitoring
- Update SEO metadata and structured data to position as Melbourne AI security specialists
- Integrate AI security terminology throughout: prompt injection prevention, deepfake protection, AI governance
- Position Gallifrey as quantum-secure AI specialists defending against emerging digital threats

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"
